name: Fisherman: Brian Collin Fischer
description:
*Insert witty ad jingle here that i've heard way too many times in my life here*

Physics is weird and I thought it was finally time to pay hommage to the thing paying my bills <3 Of course a regular old fishing simulator is very much not my style, nor is fishing... so space fishing = much better. 

Controls:

L - To swap to 1st Pov

F - To swap to world Pov (Reset fishing)

Left Mouse Click - reel fish in

Fullscreen to see game text :)

Attributes and credits are in read me as usual!

This was a submission to RMIT Game A Week 2022 - Physics.  

Download for prettier graphics <3
